legal.checkbox: Pročitao sam i prihvaćam Politiku privatnosti i Uvjete korištenja

setup.title: Postavite svoj novčanik
setup.body1: Možete stvoriti više korisničkih računa kako biste razdvojili svoje tokene i poboljšali sigurnost.
setup.body2: Počnimo s imenom vašeg prvog profila. Kasnije možete dodati još profila.

secure.title: Osigurajte svoj novčanik
secure.body1: Spremite i ispišite Recovery Kit PDF predložak.
secure.body2: Ako ispunite Recovery Kit i spremite ga na sigurno, uvijek možete izvršiti oporavak svojeg novčanika.

password.title: Stvorite lozinku
password.body1: Kako biste zaštitili svoja sredstva, treba vam jaka lozinka. Koristite kombinaciju riječi a izbjegavajte uobičajene fraze, imena i datume.
password.body2: Preporučamo vam da zapišete svoju lozinku u Recovery Kit.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Postavite PIN kako biste bili sigurni da samo vi možete ući u svoj novčanik.

pin.title: Postavite PIN
pin.body1: Unesite PIN od šest znamenki. Za pristup računu uvijek ćete morati unijeti ovaj PIN.

confirmPin.title: Potvrdite svoj PIN kod
confirmPin.body1: Vaš PIN čuva privatnost vaših sredstava i transakcija.

backup.title: Napravite pričuvnu kopiju svojeg novčanika
backup.body1: Sada ćemo vam pokazati frazu za oporavak. Zapišite ju u svoj Recovery Kit.
backup.body2: Frazu za oporavak nemojte dijeliti ni sa kime. Ona omogućuje pristup vašim tokenima odasvud.
backup.body3: Izgubite li svoju frazu za oporavak, možete izgubiti sva sredstva.

recoveryPhrase.title: Fraza za oporavak
recoveryPhrase.body1: Zapišite riječi u svoj Recovery Kit, točnim redoslijedom.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Držite ovo za sebe i na sigurnom.
recoveryPhrase.body3: Važno je imati pohranjenu pisanu kopiju. Računala se kvare a datoteke mogu imati pogreške.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Potvrdite frazu za oporavak
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Provjerimo zajedno jeste li dobro zapisali frazu za oporavak. Odaberite riječi pravilnim redoslijedom.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Držite ju na sigurnom, izvan dosega drugih.

backupWallet.title: Spremite pričuvnu kopiju u Stronghold datoteku
backupWallet.body1: Unesite svoju lozinku kako biste spremili pričuvnu kopiju u Stronghold datoteku. Vašu lozinku koristimo za enkripciju pričuvne kopije.
backupWallet.body2: Zašto su digitalne pričuvne kopije tako važne:
backupWallet.reason1: Jednostavno oporavite svoj novčanik bez upisivanja fraze za oporavak
backupWallet.reason2: Uvezite svoj novčanik u druge uređaje

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Pričuvna kopija je uspješno napravljena
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Napravili ste Stronghold pričuvnu kopiju svojeg novčanika.

congratulations.title: Postavljanje novčanika je završeno
congratulations.body: Vaš novi novčanik spreman je za upotrebu.

import.title: Uvezite novčanik
import.body: Ako imate frazu za oporavak ili Stronghold pričuvnu kopiju, možete ih uvesti ovdje.

importFromText.title: Obnovite svoj novčanik pomoću fraze za oporavak ili seeda
importFromText.body1: Seed se sastoji od 81 znaka. Potreban je za oporavak sredstava iz starijih Trinity novčanika.
importFromText.body2: Fraza za oporavak sastoji se od 24 riječi (zajedno s razmacima). Služi za oporavak postojećeg Firefly novčanika.
importFromText.body3: Unesite svoj seed ili frazu za oporavak

importFromFile.title: Obnovite svoj novčanik iz datoteke s pričuvnom kopijom
importFromFile.body: Za obnovu novčanika uvezite datoteku s pričuvnom kopijom. To može biti Stronghold (.stronghold) ili Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx) datoteka.

importBackupPassword.title: Obnovite svoj novčanik pomoću SeedVaulta ili Strongolda
importBackupPassword.body1: Molimo vas da unesete svoju lozinku za pričuvnu kopiju.
importBackupPassword.body2: Ovo je lozinka koju ste postavili kada ste izradili pričuvnu kopiju.

importSuccess.title: Uspješno ste obnovili pričuvnu kopiju
importSuccess.body: Sada možete postaviti svoj novi novčanik.
importSuccess.seedvaultBody: Vaša je lozinka točna, možete nastaviti.
importSuccess.strongholdBody: Vaša je lozinka točna, možete nastaviti.

migrate.title: Migrirajte svoja sredstva
migrate.body1: Ovo je automatski postupak za prebacivanje vaših sredstava u novi novčanik. Provjerit ćemo već korištene adrese koje ugrožavaju vašu sigurnost.
migrate.body2: Ovo bi moglo potrajati. Za trajanja migracije ne gasite uređaj.

generalSettings.title: Opće postavke
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Sigurnost
security.description: Promijena lozinke i ostale postavke sigurnosti

advancedSettings.title: Napredne postavke
advancedSettings.description: Alati i ručne postavke za tehnički potkovane korisnike

helpAndInfo.title: Pomoć i informacije
helpAndInfo.description: Pronađite odgovor na pitanje ili potražite pomoć za određeni problem

profile.title: Profil
profile.description: Promjena imena profila i postavljanje avatara

currency.title: Valuta
currency.description: Prilagodba konverzije sredstava i promjene grafa vrijednosti

exportStronghold.title: Izvezi sigurnosnu kopiju
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallet and latest transaction history.

appLock.title: Automatic Lock
appLock.description: Time elapsed before your wallet locks and logs you out

changePassword.title: Promijenite lozinku
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallet. You must use a strong password to protect your funds.

changePincode.title: Promijenite PIN kod
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

resyncAccounts.title: Ponovno sinkroniziranje računa
resyncAccounts.description: Pokreće pozadinski postupak koji će provjeriti jesu li svi vaši računi aktualni.

deleteProfile.title: Izbrišite profil
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire wallet, profile and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup.

deepLinks.title: Deep Links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking an iota:// link

developerMode.title: Razvojno okruženje
developerMode.description: Connect to testnets and other developer features

nodeSettings.title: Node settings
nodeSettings.description: Select Manual to choose from the node list or connect to your own node

proofOfWork.title: Proof of work
proofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

errorLog.title: Error log
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

stateExport.title: State export
stateExport.description: Export your transaction history to a .csv file

troubleshoot.title: Rješavanje problema
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Dokumentacija
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: Često postavljana pitanja
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported.

login.pleaseWait: Please wait {time, plural, one {1 second} other {# seconds}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 incorrect attempt} other {# incorrect attempts}}

strongholdBackup.title: Sigurnosna kopija novčanika
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago

password.title: Potrebna je lozinka
password.subtitle: Please enter your password to unlock Stronghold
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

version.title: Current version: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: You are running the latest and safest version of Firefly.

backup.title: Last backup: {date}
backup.backupDescription: It is important to back up regularly to ensure you have a copy of your accounts and transaction history.
backup.backupWarning: If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: You have not backed up your Stronghold

deleteAccount.title: Remove {name}?
deleteAccount.body: You can add this account back later but you may lose your transaction history.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: To remove an account it must have 0 balance.
deleteAccount.errorBody2: You currently have {balance} remaining on this account. Please move these funds to a different account and try again.
deleteAccount.errorBody3: You cannot remove this account, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti ovaj node?

deleteProfile.title: Izbrišite profil
deleteProfile.confirmation: Sigurno želiš obrisati ovaj profil? Ova akcija se ne može poništiti.

actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: Zapisao sam svoju frazu za oporavak

general.scanQrOrPaste: Skenirajte QR kod ili zalijepite Adresu
general.enterSeedOrPhrase: Unesite frazu za oporavak ili seed
general.noAccounts: Ne posjeduješ niti jedan račun, molimo kreiraj jedan.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# month} other {# months}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# year} other {# years}} ago

notifications.updateError: Došlo je do pogreške tijekom ažuriranja. Molimo, pokušajte ponovo
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your account name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest account before creating a new one.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this account.
account.duplicate: An account with this name already exists.
account.tilde: Ime profila ne može početi znakom '~'.
account.control: Ime profila ne smije sadržavati Ctrl znak.
account.startDot: Ime profila ne može početi točkom.
account.chars: Ime profila ne smije uključivati neki od sljedećih znakova <>:"/\|?*

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.
send.noToAccount: Niste odabrali račun na koji želite poslati sredstva.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.

node.https: HTTPS is required. Set up a developer profile to use unsecured HTTP connections.
node.duplicate: This node has already been added.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
